import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' interface ProblemAnalysisProps { projectId: string stepId: number onSave: (data: any) => void } interface ProblemData { description: string rootCauses: string[] constraints: string[] targetUsers: string successCriteria: string[] existingSolutions: { name: string; pros: string; cons: string }[] } export function StepProblemAnalysis({ projectId, stepId, onSave }: ProblemAnalysisProps) { const [problemData, setProblemData] = useState({ description: '', rootCauses: [], constraints: [], targetUsers: '', successCriteria: [], existingSolutions: [] }) const [newCause, setNewCause] = useState('') const [newConstraint, setNewConstraint] = useState('') const [newCriteria, setNewCriteria] = useState('') const [newSolution, setNewSolution] = useState({ name: '', pros: '', cons: '' }) useEffect(() => { const saved = localStorage.getItem(`problem-${projectId}-${stepId}`) if (saved) { setProblemData(JSON.parse(saved)) } }, [projectId, stepId]) const saveData = (data: ProblemData) => { setProblemData(data) localStorage.setItem(`problem-${projectId}-${stepId}`, JSON.stringify(data)) onSave(data) } const addRootCause = () => { if (!newCause.trim()) return const updated = { ...problemData, rootCauses: [...problemData.rootCauses, newCause] } saveData(updated) setNewCause('') } const addConstraint = () => { if (!newConstraint.trim()) return const updated = { ...problemData, constraints: [...problemData.constraints, newConstraint] } saveData(updated) setNewConstraint('') } const addCriteria = () => { if (!newCriteria.trim()) return const updated = { ...problemData, successCriteria: [...problemData.successCriteria, newCriteria] } saveData(updated) setNewCriteria('') } const addSolution = () => { if (!newSolution.name.trim()) return const updated = { ...problemData, existingSolutions: [...problemData.existingSolutions, newSolution] } saveData(updated) setNewSolution({ name: '', pros: '', cons: '' }) } const removeItem = (type: string, index: number) => { const updated = { ...problemData } if (type === 'cause') updated.rootCauses.splice(index, 1) if (type === 'constraint') updated.constraints.splice(index, 1) if (type === 'criteria') updated.successCriteria.splice(index, 1) if (type === 'solution') updated.existingSolutions.splice(index, 1) saveData(updated) } return (
{/* ë¬¸ì œ ì •ì˜ */}

import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' interface PartsManagementProps { projectId: string stepId: number onSave: (data: any) => void } interface Part { id: string name: string category: 'electronic' | 'mechanical' | 'material' | 'tool' | 'other' quantity: number price: number shop: string url: string purchased: boolean notes: string } interface PartsData { parts: Part[] totalBudget: number spentBudget: number } export function StepPartsManagement({ projectId, stepId, onSave }: PartsManagementProps) { const [partsData, setPartsData] = useState({ parts: [], totalBudget: 0, spentBudget: 0 }) const [newPart, setNewPart] = useState>({ name: '', category: 'electronic', quantity: 1, price: 0, shop: '', url: '', notes: '' }) const [filterCategory, setFilterCategory] = useState('all') const [showOnlyUnpurchased, setShowOnlyUnpurchased] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { const saved = localStorage.getItem(`parts-${projectId}-${stepId}`) if (saved) { const data = JSON.parse(saved) setPartsData(data) calculateSpentBudget(data.parts) } }, [projectId, stepId]) const saveData = (data: PartsData) => { setPartsData(data) localStorage.setItem(`parts-${projectId}-${stepId}`, JSON.stringify(data)) onSave(data) } const calculateSpentBudget = (parts: Part[]) => { const spent = parts .filter(p => p.purchased) .reduce((sum, p) => sum + (p.price * p.quantity), 0) setPartsData(prev => ({ ...prev, spentBudget: spent })) } const addPart = () => { if (!newPart.name?.trim()) return const part: Part = { id: Date.now().toString(), name: newPart.name!, category: newPart.category as Part['category'], quantity: newPart.quantity || 1, price: newPart.price || 0, shop: newPart.shop || '', url: newPart.url || '', purchased: false, notes: newPart.notes || '' } const updated = { ...partsData, parts: [...partsData.parts, part] } saveData(updated) setNewPart({ name: '', category: 'electronic', quantity: 1, price: 0, shop: '', url: '', notes: '' }) } const togglePurchased = (partId: string) => { const updated = { ...partsData, parts: partsData.parts.map(p => p.id === partId ? { ...p, purchased: !p.purchased } : p ) } calculateSpentBudget(updated.parts) saveData(updated) } const deletePart = (partId: string) => { const updated = { ...partsData, parts: partsData.parts.filter(p => p.id !== partId) } calculateSpentBudget(updated.parts) saveData(updated) } const updatePart = (partId: string, field: keyof Part, value: any) => { const updated = { ...partsData, parts: partsData.parts.map(p => p.id === partId ? { ...p, [field]: value } : p ) } if (field === 'price' || field === 'quantity') { calculateSpentBudget(updated.parts) } saveData(updated) } const getCategoryIcon = (category: Part['category']) => { switch (category) { case 'electronic': return 'âš¡' case 'mechanical': return 'âš™ï¸' case 'material': return 'ğŸ“¦' case 'tool': return 'ğŸ”§' default: return 'ğŸ“Œ' } } const getCategoryColor = (category: Part['category']) => { switch (category) { case 'electronic': return 'text-yellow-400' case 'mechanical': return 'text-gray-400' case 'material': return 'text-blue-400' case 'tool': return 'text-green-400' default: return 'text-purple-400' } } const filteredParts = partsData.parts.filter(part => { if (filterCategory !== 'all' && part.category !== filterCategory) return false if (showOnlyUnpurchased && part.purchased) return false return true }) const categoryStats = { electronic: partsData.parts.filter(p => p.category === 'electronic').length, mechanical: partsData.parts.filter(p => p.category === 'mechanical').length, material: partsData.parts.filter(p => p.category === 'material').length, tool: partsData.parts.filter(p => p.category === 'tool').length, other: partsData.parts.filter(p => p.category === 'other').length } const totalCost = partsData.parts.reduce((sum, p) => sum + (p.price * p.quantity), 0) const purchasedCount = partsData.parts.filter(p => p.purchased).length return (

1â†’import { useState } from 'react'
     2â†’import { MockProject, isDevelopmentMode } from '../mocks/mockData'
     3â†’
     4â†’interface ProjectDetailsProps {
     5â†’  project: MockProject
     6â†’  onBack: () => void
     7â†’  onOpenScript: () => void
     8â†’  onOpenFiles?: () => void
     9â†’  onOpenFolderDetail?: (folder: any) => void
    10â†’}
    11â†’
    12â†’export function ProjectDetails({ project, onBack, onOpenScript, onOpenFiles, onOpenFolderDetail }: ProjectDetailsProps) {
    13â†’  const [folders, setFolders] = useState(project.folders)
    14â†’  const [updating, setUpdating] = useState<number | null>(null)
    15â†’
    16â†’  const handleFolderToggle = async (folderId: number, completed: boolean) => {
    17â†’    setUpdating(folderId)
    18â†’    
    19â†’    try {
    20â†’      if (isDevelopmentMode()) {
    21â†’        // ê°œë°œ ëª¨ë“œ: ë¡œì»¬ ìƒíƒœë§Œ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
    22â†’        console.log(`Mock í´ë” ìƒíƒœ ë³€ê²½: ${folderId} -> ${completed}`)
    23â†’        setFolders(prev => 
    24â†’          prev.map(folder => 
    25â†’            folder.id === folderId ? { ...folder, completed } : folder
    26â†’          )
    27â†’        )
    28â†’        
    29â†’        // ì§€ì—° ì‹œë®¬ë ˆì´ì…˜
    30â†’        await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 500))
    31â†’      } else {
    32â†’        // í”„ë¡œë•ì…˜ ëª¨ë“œ: Electron API ì‚¬ìš©
    33â†’        const result = await window.electronAPI.updateFolderStatus(folderId, completed)
    34â†’        
    35â†’        if (result.success) {
    36â†’          setFolders(prev => 
    37â†’            prev.map(folder => 
    38â†’              folder.id === folderId ? { ...folder, completed } : folder
    39â†’            )
    40â†’          )
    41â†’        } else {
    42â†’          console.error('í´ë” ìƒíƒœ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ ì‹¤íŒ¨:', result.error)
    43â†’        }
    44â†’      }
    45â†’    } catch (error) {
    46â†’      console.error('í´ë” í† ê¸€ ì˜¤ë¥˜:', error)
    47â†’    } finally {
    48â†’      setUpdating(null)
    49â†’    }
    50â†’  }
